cause.description:
Avery has to pay for her own college education at Kansas City Art Institute.
She has received $11,000 in scholarship money, but that still leaves $14,000 left in her tuition.
Help her out!
or just join the group...
1. Avery needs a college education
2. college is damn expensive
3. strangers should give money to Avery
cause.name: Send Avery to college!
